title: "Apple bids farewell to Lightning as Eurocrats force tech titan's hand"

title: "This Analyst Thinks TSLA Stock Will Be the Next Nvidia"
text: "Morgan Stanley just upgraded Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA ) stock to an “overweight” rating and raised its price target to $400 per share. Specifically
source_name: Morgan Stanley cited the electric vehicle (EV) maker's opportunity to develop chips for autonomous driving that are superior to those of industry giant Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA )."
